short_summary: Supply and Delivery of LED lamps to Canadian Grain Commission (CGC)
description: The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC), Industry Services Department (IS) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of two (2) foot and four (4) foot T8 light-emitting diode (LED) lamps to fit into six (6) foot T8 configuration light fixtures
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### 5K003-240119 LED Grading Lamps
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Number: WS4599562341

**General Information**

* Title: LED Grading Lamps for a Canadian Government Entity
* Solicitation Number: WS4599562341
* Publication Date: July 11, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: August 12, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT (Note: This replaces the original Ariba Discovery posting closing time)
* Status: Tender Closed (Expired)

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entities**

* Canadian Grain Commission (CGC)
* Address: 303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 3G8, Canada

**Contact Information**

* John Cleodoro, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [john.cleodoro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:john.cleodoro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**

The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC), Industry Services Department (IS) requires the supply and delivery of two (2) foot and four (4) foot T8 light-emitting diode (LED) lamps that fit into six (6) foot T8 configuration light fixtures. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 12, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Access to Tender Documentation**

Tender documentation can be accessed through Ariba Discovery at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20268442?extsite=MjAyNjg0NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I only included the necessary information to fulfill the requirements. Please add or modify details as needed. I removed some redundant information and reformatted the text for
